Email Conversation Export
=========================
Export Date: 2025-09-26 11:54:29
Folder: CAHN8IG - travel update, find out more about our partnership & investment in tabby, chalhoub excellence
Message Count: 1

--------------------------------------------------
ID: CAHN8IG_00
From: Internal News <ONE.Chalhoub@chalhoub.com>
To: Hagop Ghazarian <Hagop.Ghazarian@chalhoub.com>
CC: 
BCC: 
Date: 2024-12-04 16:11
Subject: Travel Update, Find Out More About Our Partnership & Investment in Tabby, Chalhoub Excellence Awards, Retail Director Role – St Honore,  Our Tribute to Region, Jacquemus Sale & Celebrate The Season With Tryano X Mosaic
--------------------------------------------------
 <https://pukschalhoub.blob.core.windows.net/public-media/1PIWQYUr306jljORmS8dtw/544502/4C7433AD8F37E0FA9D7A0F760761734E/top-banner-eng.png> 	
 <https://pukschalhoub.blob.core.windows.net/public-media/1PIWQYUr306jljORmS8dtw/550450/5DD1232732CF1D37DD032DBFC2431B69/pexels-camcasey-1157255-2.jpg> 	
As the devastating events of the recent conflict unfold, our thoughts remain with all those affected. We want to extend our deepest sympathies to any of you who have experienced personal loss during these difficult times. We hope that your families and loved ones are safe, and that peace will prevail in the region.

We are relieved by the news of a ceasefire and remain hopeful that Lebanon will soon return to a sense of normalcy and security. In the meantime, we want to share updates regarding travel:

- Business Travel and Working Abroad: For the time being, business travel to Lebanon and working remotely from the country remain prohibited.

metadata.doc_id: CAHN8IG - travel update, find out more about our partnership & investment in tabby, chalhoub excellence\Conversation.txt
metadata.doc_path: C:\Users\ASUS\Desktop\Outlook\CAHN8IG - travel update, find out more about our partnership & investment in tabby, chalhoub excellence\Conversation.txt

chunks.text:
- Business Travel and Working Abroad: For the time being, business travel to Lebanon and working remotely from the country remain prohibited. This measure is in place to ensure the safety of all our employees.

- Private Travel: Personal trips to Lebanon remain at your own discretion and responsibility, given the current instability and unpredictability of the situation.

Please don’t hesitate to reach out to HR if you have any questions or need additional support during this time. Your well-being remains our priority, and we are here for you.

Together, let us continue to hope for peace and stability in Lebanon and across the region.

 <https://pukschalhoub.blob.core.windows.net/public-media/1PIWQYUr306jljORmS8dtw/545141/658DE50C6BC0BBEAA81F2EB768FCB10D/nuggets-05.png> 	

FIND OUT MORE ABOUT OUR PARTNERSHIP & INVESTMENT IN TABBY

 <https://pukschalhoub.blob.core.windows.net/public-media/1PIWQYUr306jljORmS8dtw/550694/B4F113F382F467D699172276AFF0B677/tabby.png> 	
Learn how a strategic focus on implementing innovative payment methods transformed into Group wide efficiencies and a successful investment in Tabby. Join us to hear the full story and learn more with:

- Michael Chalhoub: President - JVs & SGII
- Miguel Calello: VP - Finance
- Nick Vinckier: Director - Corporate Innovation
- David Cano: Senior Analyst - Investment

Wednesday, 11th December | 3pm (UAE time)

Invite will soon be sent to your calendars from the Internal Communications email.

 <https://pukschalhoub.blob.core.windows.net/public-media/1PIWQYUr306jljORmS8dtw/545187/D2B7C565CA630A68BC201F481E7A3E59/nuggets-38.png>

<https://pukschalhoub.blob.core.windows.net/public-media/1PIWQYUr306jljORmS8dtw/545187/D2B7C565CA630A68BC201F481E7A3E59/nuggets-38.png> 	

ONLY 2 DAYS LEFT!

 <https://pukschalhoub.blob.core.windows.net/public-media/1PIWQYUr306jljORmS8dtw/550525/3AF3B0965BF3029B5782FDA1214A75F7/banner-43.png> 	
Submit your nominations for the Chalhoub Excellence Awards (CEA) before December 6th.

Celebrate a team, project, or leader who has made a meaningful impact by recognizing their remarkable contributions.

With seven categories—Impactful Sustainability, Collaboration & Co-Creation, Customer Centricity, Servant Leadership, Entrepreneurial Spirit & Innovation, Excellence, and Diversity, Equity & Inclusion—you have the opportunity to shine a spotlight on those who truly inspire and make a difference.

NOMINATE NOW

 <https://pukschalhoub.blob.core.windows.net/public-media/1PIWQYUr306jljORmS8dtw/545144/CB54ABFB001224734506B7E97BE97855/nuggets-16.png> 	

EXCITING OPPORTUNITY: RETAIL DIRECTOR ROLE – ST HONORE

The Retail Director role <https://eur03.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.onechalhoub.com%2Fredir%2Ft%3Fs%3Dhttps%253a%252f%252fonechalhoub.connexionsnow.com%252farticle%252fexciting-opportunity-retail-director-role-shape-the-future-of-the-group%26t%3DU9SNiJg0GQTL7hVYOSWdyJuc%252fgGnWD4VMSwo7%252by4NfkA1kd2MqmJGffoONiqaUeTdgNvL4YBPB%252by%252fkAoxurgWX8ZSvY5x2LDjjFfCjQ0uyZtBD8qCbseRgsHtnylvunyPNmIpoJTcXEkfbTLpJxVOrZhJZ6K%252foIqRpFWcWYvJyYX31UHFJYl5nBObmk6Y8ZG%252fHNlU3FoSqhNMUqITklD5QLJ1S6WdHDw28psgoBaO9Id0DprhZkQRKt6%252fqgZVA%252bvH%252baqcqN3wxzPA7CqDh8eU5YobKpFE8rLxTFmLHHnEZ5ZDlFInP%252fqaIokEO1SjdGk&data=05%7C02%7Chagop.ghazarian%40chalhoub.com%7Cd837f58916574b7a0a4c08dd145cba2f%7C6ef8304cf37b42a5a5690a7d8249fbf3%7C0%7C0%7C638689110688029336%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJFbXB0eU1hcGkiOnRydWUsIlYiOiIwLjAuMDAwMCIsIlAiOiJXaW4zMiIsIkFOIjoiTWFpbCIsIldUIjoyfQ%3D%3D%7C0%7C%7C%7C&sdata=LBOWgLevrS%2B3lxrHESz%2BOX7%2Fms%2B%2FlXFd8E1Rkqqo9h8%3D&reserved=0>  is at the heart of our goal to redefine retail, driving innovation and excellence.

joiTWFpbCIsIldUIjoyfQ%3D%3D%7C0%7C%7C%7C&sdata=LBOWgLevrS%2B3lxrHESz%2BOX7%2Fms%2B%2FlXFd8E1Rkqqo9h8%3D&reserved=0>  is at the heart of our goal to redefine retail, driving innovation and excellence. If you’re passionate about making your mark in the retail world and taking on a leadership role that combines strategy, innovation, and collaboration, this is the opportunity for you! Fluency in Spanish is essential for this role, as you'll need to communicate seamlessly with teams across the organisation in LATAM. Find out more <https://eur03.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.onechalhoub.com%2Fredir%2Ft%3Fs%3Dhttps%253a%252f%252fonechalhoub.connexionsnow.com%252farticle%252fexciting-opportunity-retail-director-role-shape-the-future-of-the-group%26t%3DU9SNiJg0GQTL7hVYOSWdyJuc%252fgGnWD4VMSwo7%252by4NfkA1kd2MqmJGffoONiqaUeTdgNvL4YBPB%252by%252fkAoxurgWX8ZSvY5x2LDjjFfCjQ0uyZtBD8qCbseRgsHtnylvunyPNmIpoJTcXEkfbTLpJxVOrZhJZ6K%252foIqRpFWcWYvJyYX31UHFJYl5nBObmk6Y8ZG%252fHNlU3FoSqhNMUqITklD5QLJ1S6WdHDw28psgoBaO9Id0DprhZkQRKt6%252fqgZVA%252bvH%252baqcqN3wxzPA7CqDh8eU5YobKpFE8rLxTFmLHHnEZ5ZDlFInP%252fqaIokEO1SjdGk&data=05%7C02%7Chagop.ghazarian%40chalhoub.com%7Cd837f58916574b7a0a4c08dd145cba2f%7C6ef8304cf37b42a5a5690a7d8249fbf3%7C0%7C0%7C638689110688045881%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJFbXB0eU1hcGkiOnRydWUsIlYiOiIwLjAuMDAwMCIsIlAiOiJXaW4zMiIsIkFOIjoiTWFpbCIsIldUIjoyfQ%3D%3D%7C0%7C%7C%7C&sdata=ACjb2rU%2F3huOcuUVvcXuP7vMNrSMldDCPR2C2Nt7UT8%3D&reserved=0>

BE PART OF OUR TRIBUTE TO REGION

 <https://pukschalhoub.blob.core.windows.net/public-media/1PIWQYUr306jljORmS8dtw/550690/7027AB3A1F168AD59CDE7FE869455A58/chalhoub-sports-day-14.gif> 	
Share your favorite high-quality photos that highlight the charm of Bilad Al Sham. The best ones will be featured in our 2024 Sustainability Report!

Steps to Participate:
1. Choose a beautiful nature or cultural photo that was taken by YOU in Palestine, Lebanon, Syria, & Jordan.
2. Ensure the image you choose does not include people.
3. Post your image on One Chalhoub, <https://eur03.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.onechalhoub.com%2Fredir%2Ft%3Fs%3Dhttps%253a%252f%252fonechalhoub.connexionsnow.com%252f%26t%3DU9SNiJg0GQTL7hVYOSWdyJuc%252fgGnWD4VMSwo7%252by4NfkA1kd2MqmJGffoONiqaUeTdgNvL4YBPB%252by%252fkAoxurgWX8ZSvY5x2LDjjFfCjQ0uyZtBD8qCbseRgsHtnylvunyPNmIpoJTcXEkfbTLpJxVOrZhJZ6K%252foIqRpFWcWYvJyYX31UHFJYl5nBObmk6Y8ZG%252fHNlU3FoSqhNMUqITklD5QLJ1S6WdHDw28psgoBaO9Id0DprhZkQRKt6%252fqgZVA%252bvH%252baqcqN3wxzPA7CqDh8eU5YobKpFE8rLxTFmLHHnEZ5ZDlFInP%252fqaIokEO1SjdGk&data=05%7C02%7Chagop.ghazarian%40chalhoub.com%7Cd837f58916574b7a0a4c08dd145cba2f%7C6ef8304cf37b42a5a5690a7d8249fbf3%7C0%7C0%7C638689110688073242%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJFbXB0eU1hcGkiOnRydWUsIlYiOiIwLjAuMDAwMCIsIlAiOiJXaW4zMiIsIkFOIjoiTWFpbCIsIldUIjoyfQ%3D%3D%7C0%7C%7C%7C&sdata=sIf14wRuhtNDXYSPOhePL1B1L6wgXFTSUbTC0vHVsb0%3D&reserved=0> with the Hashtag #TributeToOurRegion 
4.

 <https://pukschalhoub.blob.core.windows.net/public-media/1PIWQYUr306jljORmS8dtw/545238/B7C824A7C2CA753E9218C7833A4A2964/nuggets-27.png> 	

JACQUEMUS FRIENDS & FAMILY SALE

Enjoy a flat 50% off selected items on Jacquemus.ae.

To access the sale, log in using your Chalhoub Group credentials HERE.

The discount will be applied automatically.

 <https://pukschalhoub.blob.core.windows.net/public-media/1PIWQYUr306jljORmS8dtw/550655/E35FBAFEAC04608F20A3EBBCB0326C39/1-5-2.jpg> 	
 <https://pukschalhoub.blob.core.windows.net/public-media/1PIWQYUr306jljORmS8dtw/545541/415E790A6337802D8EADC4304D6268B1/nuggets-49.png> 	

CELEBRATE THE SEASON WITH TRYANO X MOSAIC

This festive season, we’re making gift-giving even more special with a month-long collaboration between Tryano and Mosaic! Visit our exclusive gift-wrapping station and elevate your presents with distinctive wrapping, where the timeless elegance of Tryano meets the unique artistry of Mosaic. 
Visit us at Tryano, Abu Dhabi and elevate your holiday gifting!

 <https://pukschalhoub.blob.core.windows.net/public-media/1PIWQYUr306jljORmS8dtw/550695/7EF3AAB22F50F274DF726D353FFC5F83/try_internal_comm_festive.gif> 	
For inquiries, please get in touch with us at Internal.Communications@chalhoub.com and to share your news in the Internal News please contact Yasmine.Uthman@chalhoub.com
